resources.string:
REQUIREMENTS
 1. Check the Required Attachments for Applications Submission.
 2. After clicking on the "Apply Now" button you will find the application form.
 3. The fields marked with the "Red Star" in the "Upload Documents \& Request Information" must be uploaded/filled. Other attachments/fields are optional.
 4. After filling all the fields, you can "Check & Review" the filled up information even the attached documents you've uploaded in the very first step.
 5. Before completing the application process. If required, the application can be "Saved As Draft" and later resumed from the Dashboard.
 6. After submission of application, a "Tracking Number" will be assigned to each application which can be used to track the progress of the application from the portal.
 7. Payment is required for the application, payment amount will be notified after submission of the application.

DOCUMENTS NEEDED
 1. Barangay Clearance *
 2. Community Tax Certificate *.
 3. DTI Registration * 
 4. Fire Safety Inspection Certificate of Occupancy *

REQUIREMENTS
 1. On Time Application Must be Within the 30 Days of Birth.
 2. Check the Required Attachments for Applications Submission.
 3. After clicking on the "Apply Now" button you will find the application form.
 4. The fields marked with the "Red Star" in the "Upload Documents & Request Information"
must be uploaded/filled. Other attachments/fields are optional.
 5. After filling all the fields, you can "Check & Review" the filled up information even the
attached documents you've uploaded in the very first step.
 6. Before completing the application process, if required, the application can be "Saved As
Draft" and later resumed from the Dashboard.
 7. After submission of application, a "Tracking Number" will be assigned to each
application which can be used to track the progress of the application from the portal.
 8.Payment is required for the application depending on the Municipality. LGU Butig \&
 Piagapo - 200 pesos.

DOCUMENTS NEEDED
 1. Valid ID of the applicant *
 2. Cedula *.
 3. Barangay Certificate *
